Posts.Content: Sally  Sorry to hear your having a crappy time and feeling low. I am not even close to where you are with treatment at the moment so I can only imagine what you're going through. However going out and doing fun stuff I think certainly helps. Having stuff planned a little way in advance helps to have something to look forward to (granted I'm sure it's dependant on how you feel on the day but nonetheless). My partner and I have decided to have something planned once a month, nothing major but a little treat for us both. We're having a little overnight stay in a hotel next week and planning a few spa sessions for the end of the month. Just little things to look forward to. Who'd you go see?  Sending you hugs xx
